items.title: How I Built A $1M/Year Business - And Helped My Parents Retire

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Tuan Le emigrated from Vietnam to Toronto in 2015 and vowed at 15 to help his parents retire. ai.summary: Based on the available descriptionâ€¦ The podcast episode reviews trends shaping the luxury goods market in Poland and globally, including a shift toward experiential luxury, ESG and responsible-luxury practices, the rise of "affordable luxury," personalization, and Gen Z's preference for experiences over ownership.
